_header: For lore of goods I weep sore
Note:
Cf. Walther (1969)
XWalther, Hans. Initia carmina ac versuum medii aevi posterioris latinorum. Göttingen, 1959; 2nd ed. 1969, no. 4042.
_description: Make wise use of Time — one quatrain in John Grimestone’s sermon notes preceding ‘Dampna fleo rerum, set plus fleo dampna dierum’

NLS18721.Transcription:
ffor lore of godes i wepe sorebut more for lore of dayÞou
                    godes ben lorn i may han moreTime lorn aȝen comen ne may
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 62.
